					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			exists = POM
			OR = {
				event = 259000 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
				AND = {
					event = 259001 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
					NOT = {
						event = 132018 #BRA: Inheritance of Stettin
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = POM } } #Vorpommern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = POM value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = POM value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5010045
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = POM }
			AND = {
				exists = BRA
				OR = {
					event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
					event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
					event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
				}
				NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = BRA } } #Vorpommern
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BRA value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5010046
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = POM }
			AND = {
				NOT = { exists = BRA }
				AND = {
					exists = PRU
					event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
				}
				OR = {
					event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
					event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
					event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
				}
				NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = PRU } } #Vorpommern
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

#Saxony - Meissen
#simplified version
event = {
	id = 5010048
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
	}
	random = yes
	province = 332 #Anhalt
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SAC }
	}
}

#Wirtemberg
event = {
	id = 5010054
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = WUR }
	}
}

#Baden
event = {
	id = 5011000
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAD }
		NOT = { core = { province = 373 data = -1 } } #Baden
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Baden
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Baden"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAD }
	}
}

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5011001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

	id = 5011002
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		exists = BAY
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = BAY } } #Bayern
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BAY value = 349 } #Bayern
		command = { type = relation which = BAY value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 5011003
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		AND = {
			exists = PFA
			OR = {
				AND = {
					event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
					NOT = {
						event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
						event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
					}
				}
				event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = PFA } } #Bayern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PFA value = 349 } #Bayern
		command = { type = relation which = PFA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5011004
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

	id = 5011008
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRG }
		NOT = { core = { province = 343 data = -1 } } #Kleves
		NOT = { year = 1609 }
	}
	random = yes
	province = 334 #Kleves
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Berg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRG }
	}
}

#Brandenburg - Prussia
event = {
	id = 5011009
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 312 data = -1 } } #Brandenburg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 312 #Brandenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRA }
	}
}

		NOT = { exists = BRA }

		AND = {
			exists = PRU
			event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			NOT = { owned = { province = 312 data = PRU } } #Brandenburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 312 #Brandenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 312 } #Brandenburg
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire

			event = 235009 #BRG: Union with Kleve-Mark
			year = 1609

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein
				NOT = { event = 159011 } #DAN: The fate of Holstein
			}
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SHL }
	}
}

	id = 5011010
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot

					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

		atwar = no

		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		AND = {
			exists = OLD
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
			NOT = { owned = { province = 306 data = OLD } } #Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = OLD value = 306 } #Holstein
		command = { type = relation which = OLD value = 10 }
	}

			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 345 data = BAY } } #Pfalz
		}
	}

event = {
	id = 5011039
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 302 data = -1 } } #Hinterpommern
		NOT = {
			event = 291030 #SWE: The Acquisition of Pomerania
			event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
			event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
			event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			year = 1637
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 302 #Hinterpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = POM }
	}
}

					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = POM }
			AND = {
				NOT = { exists = BRA }
				AND = {
					exists = PRU
					event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
				}
				OR = {
					event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
					event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
					event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
				}
				NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = PRU } } #Vorpommern
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

#Saxony - Meissen
#simplified version
event = {
	id = 5011048
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
	}
	random = yes
	province = 332 #Anhalt
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SAC }
	}
}

	id = 5011050
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SAC }
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
		AND = {
			exists = MEI
			NOT = { year = 1600 }
			NOT = { owned = { province = 332 data = MEI } } #Anhalt
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 332 #Anhalt
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = MEI value = 332 } #Anhalt
		command = { type = relation which = MEI value = 10 }
	}
}

#Wirtemberg
event = {
	id = 5011054
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = WUR }
	}
}

#Baden
event = {
	id = 5012000
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAD }
		NOT = { core = { province = 373 data = -1 } } #Baden
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Baden
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Baden"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAD }
	}
}

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5012001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		exists = BAY
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = BAY } } #Bayern
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BAY value = 349 } #Bayern
		command = { type = relation which = BAY value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5012003
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		AND = {
			exists = PFA
			OR = {
				AND = {
					event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
					NOT = {
						event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
						event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
					}
				}
				event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = PFA } } #Bayern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PFA value = 349 } #Bayern
		command = { type = relation which = PFA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5012004
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

	id = 5012008
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRG }
		NOT = { core = { province = 343 data = -1 } } #Kleves
		NOT = { year = 1609 }
	}
	random = yes
	province = 334 #Kleves
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Berg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRG }
	}
}

#Brandenburg - Prussia
event = {
	id = 5012009
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 312 data = -1 } } #Brandenburg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 312 #Brandenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRA }
	}
}

		NOT = { owned = { province = 313 data = BRA } } #Küstrin
	}

event = {
	id = 5012015
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 313 data = -1 } } #Küstrin
		AND = {
			exists = PRU
			event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			NOT = { owned = { province = 312 data = PRU } } #Brandenburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 313 #Küstrin
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}

event = {
	id = 5012024
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein
				NOT = { event = 159011 } #DAN: The fate of Holstein
			}
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SHL }
	}
}

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = LOR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 375 data = -1 } } #Lorraine
		NOT = {
			event = 3736 #FRA: French Inheritance of Lothringen
			year = 1766
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 375 #Lorraine
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Lorraine"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = LOR }
	}

			exists = BUR

			NOT = { owned = { province = 377 data = BUR } } #Luxembourg
		}
	}
	random = yes

	}

	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Palatinate"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PFA value = 347 } #Würzburg
		command = { type = relation which = PFA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5012038
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = PFA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 347 data = -1 } } #Würzburg
		AND = {
			exists = BAY
			OR = {
				event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
				event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 347 data = BAY } } #Würzburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 347 #Würzburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Palatinate"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BAY value = 347 } #Würzburg
		command = { type = relation which = BAY value = 10 }
	}
}

#Pomerania - Stettin
event = {
	id = 5012039
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 302 data = -1 } } #Hinterpommern
		NOT = {
			event = 291030 #SWE: The Acquisition of Pomerania
			event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
			event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
			event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			year = 1637
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 302 #Hinterpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = POM }
	}
}

	id = 5012048
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
	}
	random = yes

	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire

					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot

				}
			}

			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

		atwar = no

		NOT = { owned = { province = 332 data = SAC } } #Anhalt
	}

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

		atwar = no

		AND = {
			exists = MEI
			NOT = { year = 1600 }
			NOT = { owned = { province = 332 data = MEI } } #Anhalt
		}
	}

			AND = {

				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes

	desc = "Wirtemberg"

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5013001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5013005
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		exists = BAY
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				OR = {
					event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
					event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
				}
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 348 data = BAY } } #Ansbach
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BAY value = 348 } #Ansbach
		command = { type = relation which = BAY value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 5013006
	trigger = {

			exists = PFA

				AND = {
					event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria

						event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 348 data = PFA } } #Ansbach
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach

	desc = "Bavaria"

		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PFA value = 348 } #Ansbach
		command = { type = relation which = PFA value = 10 }
	}

event = {
	id = 5013008
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRG }
		NOT = { core = { province = 343 data = -1 } } #Kleves
		NOT = { year = 1609 }
	}
	random = yes
	province = 334 #Kleves
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Berg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRG }
	}
}

			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris

					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone

					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain

		}

		atwar = no

		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes

	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {

	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BRA value = 311 } #Magdeburg
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5013017
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 311 data = -1 } } #Magdeburg
		AND = {
			exists = PRU
			event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			NOT = { owned = { province = 311 data = PRU } } #Magdeburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 311 #Magdeburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 311 } #Magdeburg
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat

					#French satellites: BRG

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot

event = {
	id = 5013024
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein
				NOT = { event = 159011 } #DAN: The fate of Holstein
			}
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SHL }
	}
}

	id = 5013010
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		AND = {
			exists = OLD
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
			NOT = { owned = { province = 306 data = OLD } } #Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = LUX }
		NOT = { core = { province = 377 data = -1 } } #Luxembourg
		AND = {
			exists = BUR
			event = 137306 #BUR: Annexation of Luxemburg
			NOT = { owned = { province = 377 data = BUR } } #Luxembourg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 377 #Luxembourg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Luxemburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BUR value = 377 } #Luxembourg
		command = { type = relation which = BUR value = 10 }
	}
}

					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone

					#French satellites: BRG

				}
			}

		}

		NOT = {
			event = 291030 #SWE: The Acquisition of Pomerania
			event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
			event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
			event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			year = 1637
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 302 #Hinterpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = POM }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5013040
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 302 data = -1 } } #Hinterpommern
		AND = {
			exists = STT
			NOT = { owned = { province = 302 data = STT } } #Hinterpommern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 302 #Hinterpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = STT value = 302 } #Hinterpommern
		command = { type = relation which = STT value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 5013041

					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat

					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 302 data = -1 } } #Hinterpommern

			NOT = { exists = STT }
			exists = BRA
			OR = {
				event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
				event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
				event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 302 data = BRA } } #Hinterpommern

				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire

	}

	id = 5013043
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		NOT = {
			event = 259000 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
			AND = {
				event = 259001 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
				NOT = {
					event = 132018 #BRA: Inheritance of Stettin
				}
			}
			event = 291029 #SWE: The Acquisition of Vorpommern
			event = 291030 #SWE: The Acquisition of Pomerania

			event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
			event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			year = 1570
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = STT }
	}

			AND = {

				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt

					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
