					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		exists = SAC
		NOT = { core = { province = 331 data = -1 } } #Sachsen
		NOT = { owned = { province = 331 data = SAC } } #Sachsen
	}
	random = yes
	province = 331 #Sachsen
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = SAC value = 331 } #Sachsen
		command = { type = relation which = SAC value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5013052
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SAC }
		NOT = { core = { province = 331 data = -1 } } #Sachsen
		AND = {
			exists = MEI
			NOT = { year = 1600 }
			NOT = { owned = { province = 331 data = MEI } } #Sachsen
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 331 #Sachsen
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = MEI value = 331 } #Sachsen
		command = { type = relation which = MEI value = 10 }
	}
}

		NOT = { core = { province = 374 data = -1 } } #Alsace
	}
	random = yes

	desc = "Strassburg"

		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = STR }
	}
}

	id = 5013054

		ai = yes

			AND = {

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					#French satellites: BRG

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot

				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = WUR }
	}

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5014001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {

		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BAY value = 348 } #Ansbach
		command = { type = relation which = BAY value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5014006
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		AND = {
			exists = PFA
			OR = {
				AND = {
					event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
					NOT = {
						event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
						event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
					}
				}
				event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					exists = HAB
					OR = {
						event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
						event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 348 data = PFA } } #Ansbach
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PFA value = 348 } #Ansbach
		command = { type = relation which = PFA value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 5014007
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire

					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		AND = {
			exists = HAB
			OR = {
				event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
				event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 348 data = HAB } } #Ansbach
		}

	random = yes

event = {
	id = 5014008
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRG }
		NOT = { core = { province = 343 data = -1 } } #Kleves
		NOT = { year = 1609 }
	}
	random = yes
	province = 334 #Kleves
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Berg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRG }
	}
}

			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 312 data = -1 } } #Brandenburg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 312 #Brandenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRA }
	}
}

		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRE }
	}

#Cleves
#simplified version
event = {
	id = 5014019
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = KLE }
		NOT = { core = { province = 334 data = -1 } } #Münster
		NOT = {
			event = 235009 #BRG: Union with Kleve-Mark
			year = 1609
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 334 #Münster
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Cleves"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = KLE }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5014020
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = KLE }
		NOT = { core = { province = 334 data = -1 } } #Münster
		AND = {
			exists = BRG
			event = 235009 #BRG: Union with Kleve-Mark
			NOT = { owned = { province = 334 data = BRG } } #Münster
			NOT = { year = 1609 }
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 334 #Münster
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Cleves"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BRG value = 334 } #Münster
		command = { type = relation which = BRG value = 10 }
	}
}

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG

		atwar = no

		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein
				NOT = { event = 159011 } #DAN: The fate of Holstein
			}
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SHL }
	}

				}

			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = MEC }
		NOT = { core = { province = 305 data = -1 } } #Mecklenburg
	}
	random = yes
	province = 305 #Mecklenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Mecklenburg"

		name = "OK"

	id = 5014032

					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes

			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy

		}

		atwar = no

		NOT = { core = { province = 335 data = -1 } } #Oldenburg
		NOT = {
			event = 159033 #DAN: Oldenburg is incorporated into Denmark
			event = 279010 #SHL: Holstein inherits Oldenburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 335 #Oldenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Oldenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"

					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}

			flag = [PrussiaHRE]

		AND = {
			exists = SHL
			event = 279010 #SHL: Holstein inherits Oldenburg
			NOT = { owned = { province = 335 data = SHL } } #Oldenburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 335 #Oldenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Oldenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = SHL value = 335 } #Oldenburg
		command = { type = relation which = SHL value = 10 }
	}
}

			NOT = { exists = STT }
			exists = BRA
			OR = {
				event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
				event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
				event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 302 data = BRA } } #Hinterpommern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 302 #Hinterpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BRA value = 302 } #Hinterpommern
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5014042
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 302 data = -1 } } #Hinterpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = STT }
			NOT = { exists = BRA }
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
			OR = {
				event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
				event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
				event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 302 data = PRU } } #Hinterpommern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 302 #Hinterpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 302 } #Hinterpommern
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5014043
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		NOT = {
			event = 259000 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
			AND = {
				event = 259001 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
				NOT = {
					event = 132018 #BRA: Inheritance of Stettin
				}
			}
			event = 291029 #SWE: The Acquisition of Vorpommern
			event = 291030 #SWE: The Acquisition of Pomerania
			event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
			event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
			event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			year = 1570
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = STT }
	}
}

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 374 data = -1 } } #Alsace
	}
	random = yes
	province = 374 #Alsace
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Strassburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = STR }
	}
}

#Wirtemberg
event = {
	id = 5014054
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = WUR }
	}
}

	id = 5014055

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot

					#French satellites: BRG

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		AND = {
			exists = HAB
			core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = HAB value = 372 } #Württemberg
		command = { type = relation which = HAB value = 10 }
	}
}

#Baden
event = {
	id = 5015000
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAD }
		NOT = { core = { province = 373 data = -1 } } #Baden
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Baden
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Baden"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAD }
	}
}

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5015001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes

	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		AND = {
			exists = HAB
			OR = {
				event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
				event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 348 data = HAB } } #Ansbach
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = HAB value = 348 } #Ansbach
		command = { type = relation which = HAB value = 10 }
	}
}

					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone

					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon

					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 312 data = -1 } } #Brandenburg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 312 #Brandenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {

		command = { type = independence which = BRA }
	}

				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein

			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = OLD }
		NOT = { core = { province = 335 data = -1 } } #Oldenburg
		AND = {
			exists = SHL
			event = 279010 #SHL: Holstein inherits Oldenburg
			NOT = { owned = { province = 335 data = SHL } } #Oldenburg
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 335 #Oldenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Oldenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = SHL value = 335 } #Oldenburg
		command = { type = relation which = SHL value = 10 }
	}
}

		}

					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		NOT = {
			event = 259000 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
			AND = {
				event = 259001 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
				NOT = {
					event = 132018 #BRA: Inheritance of Stettin
				}
			}
			event = 291029 #SWE: The Acquisition of Vorpommern
			event = 291030 #SWE: The Acquisition of Pomerania
			event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
			event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
			event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
			year = 1570
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = STT }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5015044
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			exists = POM
			OR = {
				event = 259000 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
				AND = {
					event = 259001 #POM: Inheritance of Pomerania-Stettin
					NOT = {
						event = 132018 #BRA: Inheritance of Stettin
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = POM } } #Vorpommern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = POM value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = POM value = 10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 5015046
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = POM }
			AND = {
				NOT = { exists = BRA }
				AND = {
					exists = PRU
					event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
				}
				OR = {
					event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
					event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
					event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
				}
				NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = PRU } } #Vorpommern
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
	}
	random = yes
	province = 332 #Anhalt
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SAC }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 5015054
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire

					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I

					#French satellites: BRG

				}

		}

		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg

					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		AND = {
			exists = HAB
			core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = HAB value = 372 } #Württemberg
		command = { type = relation which = HAB value = 10 }
	}
}

#Baden
event = {
	id = 5016000
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAD }
		NOT = { core = { province = 373 data = -1 } } #Baden
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Baden
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Baden"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAD }
	}
}

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5016001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

				}
			}

			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]

		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach

			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }

event = {
	id = 5016009
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes

					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]

		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire

			event = 235009 #BRG: Union with Kleve-Mark
			year = 1609

					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = HES }
		NOT = { core = { province = 333 data = -1 } } #Hessen
	}
	random = yes
	province = 333 #Hessen
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Hesse"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = HES }
	}

#Holstein
event = {
	id = 5016024
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein
				NOT = { event = 159011 } #DAN: The fate of Holstein
			}
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SHL }
	}
}

	id = 5016010

			AND = {

					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		AND = {
			exists = OLD
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
			NOT = { owned = { province = 306 data = OLD } } #Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = OLD value = 306 } #Holstein
		command = { type = relation which = OLD value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 5016035
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}

					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}

					event = 132018 #BRA: Inheritance of Stettin
				}

					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = STT }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = POM }
			AND = {
				exists = BRA
				OR = {
					event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
					event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
					event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
				}
				NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = BRA } } #Vorpommern
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = BRA value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = 10 }
	}
}
event = {
	id = 5016046
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = POM }
		NOT = { core = { province = 304 data = -1 } } #Vorpommern
		AND = {
			NOT = { exists = POM }
			AND = {
				NOT = { exists = BRA }
				AND = {
					exists = PRU
					event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
				}
				OR = {
					event = 3896 #BRA: The Pommern Inheritance
					event = 132008 #BRA: The Pomeranian Inheritance
					event = 259016 #POM: The investiture of Brandenburg
				}
				NOT = { owned = { province = 304 data = PRU } } #Vorpommern
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

#Saxony - Meissen
#simplified version
event = {
	id = 5016048
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
	}
	random = yes
	province = 332 #Anhalt
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SAC }
	}
}

#Wirtemberg
event = {
	id = 5016054
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = WUR }
	}
}

#Bavaria
event = {
	id = 5017001
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { core = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

	id = 5017003
	trigger = {
		ai = yes

			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire

					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone

				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no

		AND = {
			exists = PFA
			OR = {
				AND = {
					event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
					NOT = {
						event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
						event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
					}
				}
				event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			}
			NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = PFA } } #Bayern
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 349 #Bayern

		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PFA value = 349 } #Bayern

	}

event = {
	id = 5017004
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BAY }
		NOT = { owned = { province = 349 data = -1 } } #Bayern
		NOT = { core = { province = 348 data = -1 } } #Ansbach
		year = 1430 #LUX and HAB before
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 255003 #PFA: The Palatinate inherits Bavaria
				NOT = {
					event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
					event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria (Palatinate inherited Burgundy)
				}
			}
			event = 255008 #PFA: The Wittelsbach inheritance of Bavaria
			event = 125035 #BAY: Straubing is ceded to Austria
			event = 255009 #PFA: Straubing is ceded to Austria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 348 #Ansbach
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Bavaria"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BAY }
	}
}

					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}

			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy

		}

		NOT = { core = { province = 343 data = -1 } } #Kleves
		NOT = { year = 1609 }
	}

	desc = "Berg"

		command = { type = independence which = BRG }

#Brandenburg - Prussia
event = {
	id = 5017009
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 312 data = -1 } } #Brandenburg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 312 #Brandenburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRA }
	}
}

			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = BRA }
		NOT = { core = { province = 313 data = -1 } } #Küstrin
		NOT = { owned = { province = 312 data = -1 } } #Brandenburg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = PRU
				event = 263014 #PRU: The Kingdom of Prussia
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 313 #Küstrin
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Brandenburg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = BRA }

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				event = 159034 #DAN: Denmark inherits Holstein
				NOT = { event = 159011 } #DAN: The fate of Holstein
			}
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SHL }
	}

					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = SHL }
		NOT = { core = { province = 306 data = -1 } } #Holstein
		AND = {
			exists = OLD
			event = 247002 #OLD: Oldenburg inherits Holstein
			NOT = { owned = { province = 306 data = OLD } } #Holstein
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 306 #Holstein
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Holstein"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = OLD value = 306 } #Holstein
		command = { type = relation which = OLD value = 10 }
	}
}

	id = 5017026

			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire

					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale

					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat

			event = 3736 #FRA: French Inheritance of Lothringen
			year = 1766
		}
	}
	random = yes

	desc = "Lorraine"

		command = { type = independence which = LOR }
	}

		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = PFA }
		NOT = { owned = { province = 345 data = -1 } } #Pfalz
		NOT = { core = { province = 347 data = -1 } } #Würzburg
		NOT = {
			event = 125021 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
			event = 125033 #BAY: The Palatinate is united with Bavaria
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 347 #Würzburg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Palatinate"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = PFA }
	}
}

					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I

					#French satellites: BRG

					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}

	province = 304 #Vorpommern
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Pomerania"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = cedeprovince which = PRU value = 304 } #Vorpommern
		command = { type = relation which = PRU value = 10 }
	}
}

#Saxony - Meissen
#simplified version
event = {
	id = 5017048
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				emperor = yes
				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris
					monarch = 049522 #La Convention Nationale
					monarch = 049523 #Le Directoire
					monarch = 049524 #Le Consulat
					monarch = 049525 #Napoléon Bonaparte
					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier
					#French satellites: ITA
					monarch = 064624 #Il Direttorio
					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = {
			exists = SAC
			exists = MEI
		}
		NOT = { core = { province = 332 data = -1 } } #Anhalt
	}
	random = yes
	province = 332 #Anhalt
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Saxony"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = SAC }
	}
}

					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP
					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no

			exists = MEI
			NOT = { year = 1600 }
			NOT = { owned = { province = 332 data = MEI } } #Anhalt
		}
	}
	random = yes

	id = 5017054

			AND = {

				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire
					monarch = 049521 #La Commune de Paris

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I
					monarch = 064628 #Eugenio de Beauharnais
					#French satellites: NAP

					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE
					monarch = 069012 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes
			monarch = 0127501 #Carlos I - for Spain
			monarch = 027006 #Charles II - for Burgundy
			flag = [PrussiaHRE]
		}
		NOT = { event = 179056 } #HAB: The Restoration in the Holy Roman Empire
		atwar = no
		NOT = { exists = WUR }
		NOT = { core = { province = 372 data = -1 } } #Württemberg
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				exists = HAB
				core = { province = 372 data = HAB } #covers HAB_179004 and HAB_179006
				NOT = { owned = { province = 372 data = HAB } } #Württemberg
			}
		}
	}
	random = yes
	province = 372 #Württemberg
	name = "AI_EVENT"
	desc = "Wirtemberg"

	action_a = {
		name = "OK"
		command = { type = independence which = WUR }
	}

			AND = {

				NOT = { #French Revolution/Empire

					monarch = 049539 #Napoléon Ier
					monarch = 049538 #Napoléon Ier

					monarch = 064625 #La Consulta
					monarch = 064626 #Napoleone Bonaparte
					monarch = 064627 #Napoleone I

					monarch = 096019 #Giuseppe Bonaparte
					monarch = 096020 #Gioacchino Napoleone
					#French satellites: KLE

					monarch = 069013 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 069014 #Louis-Napoléon
					#French satellites: BRG
					monarch = 093512 #Joachim Murat
					monarch = 093513 #Comte de Beugnot
					monarch = 093514 #Louis-Napoléon
				}
			}
			elector = yes

		}

	}
